languages.text: Корабль Вольного Торговца медленно подтягивается к космической дыре — очертания стен, техники и людей внутри искажаются, мерцают и вытягиваются под влиянием невидимой силы. В ответ на это машинные духи неистовствуют, выводя из строя когитаторы на всех палубах.

traits.locale_text: Корабль Вольного Торговца медленно подтягивается к космической дыре — очертания стен, техники и людей внутри искажаются, мерцают и вытягиваются под влиянием невидимой силы. В ответ на это машинные духи неистовствовуют, выводя из строя когитаторы на всех палубах.

languages.text: The Rogue Trader's vessel slowly draws closer to the cosmic hole. The outlines of walls, equipment, and people inside the voidship are distorted as they flicker and stretch under the influence of an invisible force. The machine spirits are badly affected and start rampaging across the ship, disabling cogitators on every deck.
languages.original_text: Корабль Вольного Торговца медленно подтягивается к космической дыре — очертания стен, техники и людей внутри искажаются, мерцают и вытягиваются под влиянием невидимой силы. В ответ на это машинные духи неистовствуют, выводя из строя когитаторы на всех палубах.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader's vessel slowly draws closer to the cosmic hole. The outlines of walls, equipment and people inside the voidship are distorted as they flicker and stretch under the influence of an invisible force. The machine spirits are badly affected and start rampaging across the ship, disabling cogitators on every deck.

The machine spirits are badly affected and start rampaging across the ship, disabling cogitators on every deck.

The outlines of walls, equipment, and people inside the voidship are distorted as they flicker and stretch under the influence of an invisible force. The machine spirits are badly affected and start rampaging across the ship, disabling cogitators on every deck.

The Rogue Trader's vessel slowly draws closer to the cosmic hole. The outlines of walls, equipment, and people inside the voidship are distorted as they flicker and stretch under the influence of an invisible force. The machine spirits are badly affected and start rampaging across the ship, disabling cogitators on every deck.

languages.text: 行商浪人的船慢慢靠近宇宙的空洞。在某种看不到的力量影响下，船内的墙壁、设备，以及人的轮廓，都在不断扭曲、闪烁、拉伸。机魂受到了恶性干扰，在船上横冲直撞，每个甲板上的沉思者都瘫痪了。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's vessel slowly draws closer to the cosmic hole. The outlines of walls, equipment, and people inside the voidship are distorted as they flicker and stretch under the influence of an invisible force. The machine spirits are badly affected and start rampaging across the ship, disabling cogitators on every deck.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人的船慢慢靠近宇宙的空洞。在某种看不到的力量影响下，船内的墙壁、设备，以及人的轮廓，都在不断扭曲、闪烁、拉伸。机魂受到了恶性干扰，在船上横冲直撞，每个甲板上的思考器都瘫痪了。

languages.text: 自由開拓者の船は、ゆっくりと宇宙の穴に近づいていく。ヴォイドシップ内の壁、設備、人々の輪郭が、目に見えない力の影響を受けて明滅し、伸縮しながら歪んでいる。機械精霊はひどく影響を受け、船内で暴れ始め、すべての甲板の考算機を無力化する。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's vessel slowly draws closer to the cosmic hole. The outlines of walls, equipment, and people inside the voidship are distorted as they flicker and stretch under the influence of an invisible force. The machine spirits are badly affected and start rampaging across the ship, disabling cogitators on every deck.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者の船は、ゆっくりと宇宙の穴に近づいていく。ヴォイドシップ内の壁、設備、人々の輪郭が、目に見えない力の影響を受けて明滅し、伸縮しながら歪んでいる。機械精霊はひどく影響を受け、船内で暴れ始め、すべての甲板の考算機を無力化する。

languages.text: La nave {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente se acerca lentamente al agujero cósmico. Los contornos de las paredes, los equipos y las personas del interior de la nave se distorsionan al moverse y estirarse bajo la influencia de una fuerza invisible. Los espíritus máquina se ven gravemente afectados y comienzan a arrasar la nave, inutilizando los cogitadores de todas las cubiertas.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's vessel slowly draws closer to the cosmic hole. The outlines of walls, equipment, and people inside the voidship are distorted as they flicker and stretch under the influence of an invisible force. The machine spirits are badly affected and start rampaging across the ship, disabling cogitators on every deck.

traits.locale_text: La nave {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente se acerca lentamente al agujero cósmico. Los contornos de las paredes, los equipos y las personas del interior de la nave se distorsionan al moverse y estirarse bajo la influencia de una fuerza invisible. Los espíritus máquina se ven gravemente afectados y comienzan a arrasar la nave, inutilizando los cogitadores de todas las cubiertas.

languages.text: Das Schiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} nähert sich langsam dem kosmischen Loch. Die Umrisse von Wänden, Ausrüstung und Besatzung auf dem Raumschiff werden verzerrt, sie flackern und dehnen sich unter dem Einfluss einer unsichtbaren Macht. Die Maschinengeister sind besonders stark betroffen und beginnen, über das Schiff zu wüten und auf allen Decks Cogitatoren auszuschalten.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's vessel slowly draws closer to the cosmic hole. The outlines of walls, equipment, and people inside the voidship are distorted as they flicker and stretch under the influence of an invisible force. The machine spirits are badly affected and start rampaging across the ship, disabling cogitators on every deck.

traits.locale_text: Das Schiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} nähert sich langsam dem kosmischen Loch. Die Umrisse von Wänden, Ausrüstung und Besatzung auf dem Raumschiff werden verzerrt, sie flackern und dehnen sich unter dem Einfluss einer unsichtbaren Macht. Die Maschinengeister sind besonders stark betroffen und beginnen, über das Schiff zu wüten und auf allen Decks Cogitatoren auszuschalten.

languages.text: Le vaisseau {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} se rapproche lentement du trou noir. Les contours des cloisons, de l'équipement et des hommes à son bord sont distordus à mesure qu'ils vacillent et s'étirent sous l'influence d'une force invisible. Gravement affectés, les esprits de la machine se mettent à semer le chaos à bord du bâtiment, désactivant l'ensemble du réseau de cogitateurs.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's vessel slowly draws closer to the cosmic hole. The outlines of walls, equipment, and people inside the voidship are distorted as they flicker and stretch under the influence of an invisible force. The machine spirits are badly affected and start rampaging across the ship, disabling cogitators on every deck.

traits.locale_text: Le vaisseau {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} se rapproche lentement du trou noir. Les contours des cloisons, de l'équipement et des hommes à son bord sont distordus à mesure qu'ils vacillent et s'étirent sous l'influence d'une force invisible. Gravement affectés, les esprits de la machine se mettent à semer le chaos à bord du bâtiment, désactivant l'ensemble du réseau de cogitateurs.

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in gemisi yavaşça kozmik deliğe yaklaşıyor. Uçsuz gemisinin içindeki duvarların, ekipmanların ve insanların silüetleri; görünmez bir kuvvetin etkisiyle titreyerek ve uzayarak bozuluyor. Makine ruhları ciddi şekilde etkileniyor ve gemide bir kargaşaya neden olarak her güvertedeki kavramsayarları devre dışı bırakıyor.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's vessel slowly draws closer to the cosmic hole. The outlines of walls, equipment, and people inside the voidship are distorted as they flicker and stretch under the influence of an invisible force. The machine spirits are badly affected and start rampaging across the ship, disabling cogitators on every deck.
